item.description:
Hi everyone,

I'm delighted to share an opportunity to spend an evening with the renowned and inspiring Dr. Bernie Siegel. As many of you know, Bernie has been helping people for years to reconnect with the joy of their inner spirit and find opportunities for self healing. In 1978 he founded "Exceptional Cancer Patients" to provide safe, loving, therapeutic "carefrontation" to those struggling with cancer. He's touched thousands of lives around the world and has made enormous contributions to patient empowerment. You can read more at his website, http://www.berniesieg....

On Thursday, February 17 at 7 pm, he will present an evening of "Love, Medicine, and Miracles." This is a wonderful chance to spend some time with an amazing healer, hear his stories of compassion and inspiration, and ask questions in an intimate group environment.

Tickets are $20 and we are limiting this to only 75 attendees, so it's a first come first serve basis. You can reserve a seat online by visiting www.learn.edu/events.

I hope to see you there!

Warm wishes,
Leslie
item.name: Dr. Bernie Siegel Presents An Evening of "Love, Medicine, and Miracles"
